project.name: Zeega Player
project.description: Core code for the Zeega Player

Player.name: Player

classitems.description: Sets the player to play when data is successfully parsed and rendered to the dom
classitems.name: autoplay

classitems.description: Creates a player with no visual controls. Useful if wrapping the player in custom UI
classitems.name: chromeless

classitems.description: Sets the collection project playback
classitems.name: collection_mode

classitems.description:
Time to wait after player is ready before playing project

overrides any overlay attributes
classitems.name: delay

classitems.description: Sets if the project be escaped through user input (esc or close buttons)
classitems.name: escapable

classitems.description: If there are overlays, do they fade out?
classitems.name: fade_overlays

classitems.description: ms the player takes to fade in
classitems.name: fadeIn

classitems.description: ms the player takes to fade out
classitems.name: fadeOut

classitems.description: Sets if the player be set to fullscreen
classitems.name: fullscreenEnable

classitems.description: Turns the keyboard controls on or off
classitems.name: keyboard

classitems.description: Sets the player mode
classitems.name: mode

classitems.description: Sets the individual properties of overlays
classitems.name: overlays

classitems.description: Turn on/off arrows
classitems.name: overlays.arrows

classitems.description: Turn on/off Zeega branding
classitems.name: overlays.branding

classitems.description: Turn on/off Zeega layer level citations
classitems.name: overlays.citations_layers

classitems.description: Turn on/off frame level citations
classitems.name: overlays.citations_frame

classitems.description: Turn on/off frame project level citations
classitems.name: overlays.citations_project

classitems.description: Turn on/off social share icons
classitems.name: overlays.social

classitems.description: The number of frames to attempt preload on
classitems.name: preload_ahead

classitems.description: The frame id to start the player
classitems.name: start_frame

classitems.description: The id of the target div to draw the player into
classitems.name: div

classitems.description: Defines whether or not the player is fullscreen or scales to fit the browser.
classitems.name: window_fit

classitems.description: Defines aspect ratio of the Zeega project
classitems.name: window_ratio

classitems.description:
load 
loads the project with data or supplied project_url
classitems.name: load

props.name: project_url
props.description: A complete project_url pointing to a valid Zeega project data file.

classitems.description:
play 
plays the project
-if the player is paused, then play the project
-if the player is not rendered, then render it first
classitems.name: play

classitems.description: Fired when an error occurs...
classitems.name: onError
